name: @ilrweb/legalrepositories
description: Composer-based Drupal site for ILR Legal Repositories

scripts.postinstall: if [ -L "./web/libraries/union" ]; then echo "./web/libraries/union is a symlink; skipping copy from ./node_modules"; else rsync -av --delete ./node_modules/@cornell_ilr/union ./web/libraries/; fi
